p: An interleukin (IL)-6 inhibitor has been tried in severe COVID-19 disease with raised IL-6 levels.[ 24] A variety of other investigational molecules including ribavirin, immunoglobulins, washed microbiota transplant, combination of darunavir cobicistat, arbidol hydrochloride, sofosbuvir, favipiravir, and interferon are under the study for COVID-19.[ 25 26]
